Hi guys!

I'm bored, and I want to start working on an ICBM to try to bomb KSC2. What heading would I need to face to hit it?

Is there a simple way to compute this from the map?

Thanks,

Sam
hmmmm....spawn a simple probe core at KC2 . THen target that
